short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Download Now Button is a plugin that allows you to open downloads tabs quickly with only one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Download Now Button" is an easy-to-use and lightweight add-on that allows you to open the downloads tab as quickly as possible

- Add a new tab to the downloads page by creating a toolbar button and adding it.
- A context menu item is added to open downloads page (similar to the toolbar button).
- If the downloads tab is already open, clicking on the toolbar button will just reload the tab.
- You can still use (Ctrl+J) hotkey to access downloads tab.
